title: Riemannian Adam/Amsgrad on product manifolds with convergence guarantee but not supported well by experiments.
review:
The paper extends Euclidean optimization methods, Adam/Amsgrad, to the Riemannian setting, and provides theoretical convergence analysis which includes the Euclidean versions as a special case. To avoid breaking the sparsity, coordinate-wise updates are performed on product manifolds. 

The empirical performance seems not very good, compared to RSGD which is easier to use.
confidence: 3: The reviewer is fairly confident that the evaluation is correct
